"Slona": "Many ARKS live here. There's a good range of facilities available as well, so definitely take a look around."
"If not, please allow me to inform you."
"You might see what look like giant Mags dotted around Halpha. We call them Regional Mags."
"It's said that \"good things\" may happen if you give items to a Regional Mag."
"If you see one out there, definitely give it a try."
"Hey, you're back! It looks like you found a Regional Mag."
"I wonder if you'll be able to feel the effects of the \"good thing\" right away..."
"There are plenty of other Regional Mags out there, with their own special effects."
"If you find any others, be sure to offer them something."
"Oh... I'll see you some other time then."
